summary: Citroën is a French car brand founded in 1919 by André Citroën. It's now part of a bigger company called Stellantis. Citroën is known for its innovative technology, like the world's first front-wheel-drive car, the Traction Avant, in 1934. In 1955, they introduced the DS, one of the first cars with disc brakes. Citroën has won several awards, including three European Car of the Year titles.
title: Citroën
